column2: Aware of SDLC and Support processes as required by projects      Taking ownership of end-to-end campaign execution and monitoring      Hands on experience with Email Studio knowledge - A/B Testing, Segmentation, and Integration with microsites, websites and landing pages, personalization concepts, triggered emails, campaign waves,      Support and execute the B2C and B2B digital demand generation strategy, including development of all inbound and outbound tactics, including emails, landing pages, forms, CTAs and workflows      Test and optimize the user experience to drive demand generation and conversion across all digital properties - including multivariate A/B testing      Manage all technical aspects of marketing automation (Marketo) and CRM integration      Develop scheduled and incremental reporting with the ability to compile and review raw data, provide detailed analyses and regularly assess program effectiveness and make recommendations and optimizations      Supports system and user acceptance testing and defect resolution      Ability to conduct end-user training - good to have.      Proficiency in Microsoft Office          TECHNICAL SKILLS               Working in a digital marketing / marketing automation role or similar      Development and support experience of a min of 3+ years in Marketo or any Marketing Automatino Tools      Create, and execute all assets(Emails, Landing Pages, Lists, Smart Lists, Smart Campaigns, Marketing Programs etc.) in Marketo. Manage all list uploads and distribution in Marketo.      Develop and maintain meaningful database segmentation that translates into a tailored campaign and program experience for audiences that span across specific market segments, industries, and roles. Monitor database hygiene, performing ongoing data cleansing to maintain the health and accuracy of our marketing database.      Build and maintain customer journeys, advanced nurture builds, drip and one-time email campaigns across the customer lifecycle that drive engagement and conversions.      Conduct ongoing A/B testing related to subject lines, email copy, layouts and CTAs that drive conversion improvements.      Conduct ongoing efforts to improve our sender scores and deliverability rates and monitor key email performance metrics and manage unsubscribes/subscription preferences.      Knowledge on a scripting tool like JS for building anding pages layout (PML (Pardot Merge Language) &HML - Handlebars Merge Language)      Ensure lead-scoring process is followed to pass qualified leads to sales and improve conversion rates.      Knowledge of email regulations (CAN-SPAM, GDPR, etc.) Ability to manage multiple projects at the same time - Work successfully with cross functional teams.      Knowledge on APIs. Ability to understand different systems API and use cases.      Proven technical proficiency / certification with marketing automation platforms (Marketo Certification preferred)
column11: data cleansing, Outbound, Marketing programs, Management, Digital marketing, User acceptance testing, Monitoring, SDLC, CRM, marketing automation

column2: As a    Variant Configuration Modeler    , you will have the opportunity to tap into your curiosity and collaborate with some of the most innovative and diverse people around the world. Here, you will make an impact by:        Design and implement variant configuration models for new products and maintain/deploy existing models.      Utilize best practices and efficiently utilize Variant Configuration (VC) objects like characteristics, classes, configuration profiles, constraints, procedures, selection conditions, super bom, super recipe, variant table, user interface, variant pricing.      Understand material variants, price linking, and sales order costing.      Examine existing models/processes and identify opportunities to improve and/or add automation.      Document model requirements in work instructions/job aids for product support.              Your Skills and Expertise        To set you up for success in this role from day one, 3M requires (at a minimum) the following qualifications:        Bachelor s degree or higher in Engineering, Computer Science, or related field of study (completed and verified prior to start) from an accredited institution.      Four (4) years of experience in SAP Variant Configuration (VC), Advanced Variant Configuration (AVC) and Solution Sales Configurator (SSC) with at least 1-2 full cycle SAP implementations.      VC system configuration and relevant cross-functional knowledge of integration points with other modules      Excellent communication skills (verbal and written). Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical audiences.      Ability to work with business partners in different locales/time zones. Ability to collaborate with global team in US and UK. Shift of 2pm - 11pm.            Additional qualifications that could help you succeed even further in this role include:        Experience building VC models in a manufacturing sector.      Attention to detail.      S/4 HANA project experience.
column11: Computer science, variant configuration, Solution sales, Automation, Usage, Costing, SAP, Compliance, Deployment, Product support

column2: Plan and execute migrations, implementations, and upgrades of Atlassian applications between Data Center and Cloud environments.              Ensure seamless transitions with minimal disruption to services and data integrity. Manage and administer Atlassian products including Jira, Jira Service Management (JSM), and Confluence across Data Center and Cloud platforms.              Configure, customize, and optimize system settings, workflows, and permissions to meet organizational needs.              Develop and implement automation solutions to streamline administrative tasks, enhance productivity, and improve efficiency within Jira, JSM, and Confluence.              Utilize scripting languages such as Groovy, Python, or PowerShell to automate routine processes and workflows.              Integrate Atlassian products with other systems and tools to improve interoperability and functionality.              Customize workflows, issue types, and dashboards to align with business requirements and enhance user experience.              Implement and enforce security measures, access controls, and compliance standards to safeguard Atlassian applications and data.              Stay informed about security vulnerabilities and apply patches and updates as necessary to maintain system integrity.              Create and maintain technical documentation, user guides, and training materials for Atlassian administrators and end-users.              Provide training and support to ensure proficient utilization of Atlassian tools and features. Qualifications:              Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.                  3 to 5 years of experience in administering Atlassian products such as Jira, Jira Service Management (JSM), and Confluence.              Strong knowledge and hands-on experience in migration, implementation, and upgradation of Atlassian applications in both Data Center and Cloud environments.              Proficiency in automation scripting languages (e.g., Groovy, Python, PowerShell) for automating tasks within Jira, JSM, and Confluence.              Experience with system integration, customization, and security management within Atlassian ecosystems.              Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues.                  Effective communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work in a team environment.                  Atlassian certification (e.g., Atlassian Certified Professional) is a plus.
column11: Service management, Automation, Security management, Powershell, System integration, JIRA, Information technology, Python, Technical documentation

column2: Facilitate the implementation and support of SAP SD          Perform detailed analysis of complex business process requirements and provide appropriate system solutions; identify, interpret, validate and document customer requirements          Facilitate workshops to collect business requirements          Map client business requirements, processes and objectives; develops necessary product modifications to satisfy clients needs.
